name: pkmn but I only had 1 hour
name_original: pkmn but I only had 1 hour
description:
I tried making pkmn in 1 hour but it was a bit short so I didn't finish it.Game Maker Studi 2 Source code is uncluded if you want to finish my game!

  • Controls: WASD/arrow keys/left click: move
  • Left click the FIGHT button to attack
